original_body_lines: The students of the Chulapadmendra catwalk walk studio, took to the ramp and set it alight with some glorious display of fashion, style and glamour.

Beauty and fashion are two sides of the same coin and like the famous poet John Keats rightly said, ” A thing of beauty is a joy forever, its loveliness increases, it will never pass into nothingness…”, which is so true to this day.
GLOW is Sri Lanka’s first complete skincare nutrient for a radiant and glowing skin, everyday.
GLOW has been proven to improve the color, complexion, brightness, softness and smoothness of the skin and keep it radiant and glowing.

Testimonials from those present at the event among models, designers and other attendees, emphasized the value that GLOW offered to the skin in terms of reducing skin damage, uneven skin tone and in terms of meeting the nutritional needs of the skin. Some also spoke of the trust they had on the brand and their long standing association with it as a loyal user

GLOW has been promoting beauty from within, which literally means good nutrition as the foundation to good skin health on one side and on the other, stands for qualities of kindness, grace, care, gratitude and humanness.

A partner in the beauty of many women internationally and in Sri Lanka, too, GLOW came out to partner Chula in her endeavor to promote fashion with young models from her academy showcasing their tremendous talent and courage, while the fashion designers displayed their creativity in all fervor.
The fashion show that possibly stretched to 3 hours was mesmerizing and captivating with its variety and diversity.
The packed audience at the Taj Samudra hotel, surely enjoyed every bit of it and must have been a glowing experience for all of them.
At the end of the day, it just takes two capsules of GLOW a day to set any heart on fire.
